languages.text: "Он собирался за что-то отомстить Теодоре и для этого он хотел добраться до патента".

traits.locale_text: "Он собирался отомстить Теодоре за старую обиду и сам стать Вольным Торговцем".

languages.text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."
languages.original_text: "Он собирался за что-то отомстить Теодоре и для этого он хотел добраться до патента".

traits.locale_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."
"He intended to take revenge on Theodora for an old grudge and become the Rogue Trader himself."
"He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."
"He intended to take revenge on Theodora for an old grudge and become the Rogue Trader himself."
"He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."
"He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

languages.text: “出于某种原因，他打算报复西奥多拉。夺取授状是他复仇计划的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: “出于某种原因，他打算报复西奥多拉。夺取许可证是他复仇计划的一部分。”

languages.text: «Quería vengarse de Theodora por algo, y llegar hasta la Patente formaba parte de su plan».
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: «Quería vengarse de Theodora por algo, y llegar hasta la Patente formaba parte de su plan».

languages.text: 「彼は何らかの理由のためにシオドーラ様に復讐するつもりだった。令状を手に入れることは、どういうわけか、その計画の一部だった」
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は何らかの理由のためにテオドラに復讐するつもりだった。令状を手に入れることは、どういうわけか、その計画の一部だった」
「彼は何らかの理由のためにシオドーラ様に復讐するつもりだった。令状を手に入れることは、どういうわけか、その計画の一部だった」

languages.text: « Pour une raison obscure, il voulait se venger de Théodora, ce qui impliquait apparemment de mettre la main sur sa lettre de marque. »
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: « Pour une raison obscure, il voulait se venger de Théodora, ce qui impliquait apparemment de mettre la main sur sa lettre de marque. »

languages.text: "Er wollte aus irgendeinem Grund Rache an Theodora nehmen, und den Handelsbrief zu erreichen, war wohl Teil des Plans."
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: "Er wollte aus irgendeinem Grund Rache an Theodora nehmen, und den Handelsbrief zu erreichen, war wohl Teil des Plans."

languages.text: "Bir sebepten ötürü Theodora'dan intikam alma niyetindeymiş, Ruhsatname'ye ulaşmak da planının bir parçasıymış."
languages.original_text: "He intended to take revenge on Theodora for something, and trying to reach the Warrant was somehow part of that plan."

traits.locale_text: "Bir sebepten ötürü Theodora'dan intikam alma niyetindeymiş, Ruhsatname'ye ulaşmak da planının bir parçasıymış."
